Articles.Content: What do you think of Hulu Plus or Netflix?What do you think is worth it?I tried both.

Had a month's free trial of Hulu Plus, and used it but didn't bother subscribing. We have Antenna TV and Me TV available on cable, and those already meet my 60s sitcom needs.

We've had Netflix for at least a decade. I'd probably drop it personally, but one of the housemates is really into older minor movies mostly just available on DVD. So he gets a lot of value from it. Their original streaming service was awesome, but now due to movie studio greed they're just another HBO-type service with changing movies every month.

I pay for Netflix and Amazon Prime, though Amazon Prime is more for shipping than anything else. I watch some stuff on it, sure, but primarily I watch Netflix.

I won't pay for Hulu. If I wanted to pay AND see commercials I would still pay for cable TV. However I do watch several new shows (Gotham, SHIELD, and Agent Carter if you're curious) on the free Hulu and don't mind the commercials because it's free.

Id go with Netflix, hands down.

No offense to Hulu users, but it sucks.

Why? Ads, being limited to 2 seasons with 4 episodes available per show, not having alot of shows, ect.
